title: Servant Leadership 1-on-1 Coaching Agenda
description: A structured 45-minute coaching agenda where the direct report owns the meeting. Designed to operationalize empathy, psychological safety, and human growth in every conversation ‚Äî augmented by AI coaching assistants.

segments.name: Personal Connection & Well-being
prompts: How are you doing outside of work?
Are your current stress levels manageable?
How can we better support your well-being this week?
segments.aiSupport: AI agents silently track working hours across digital tools to alert the manager of potential systemic burnout risks prior to the meeting.

segments.name: Priority Alignment & Focus
prompts: What are your top priorities this week?
How do you see these tasks aligning with our broader sustainability and business goals?
segments.aiSupport: Platform dashboards automatically visualize the connection between employee tasks and macro Sustainable Balanced Scorecard KPIs.

segments.name: Obstacle Removal
prompts: What systemic roadblocks are slowing you down?
What resources, approvals, or cross-departmental friction can I remove for you today?
segments.aiSupport: NLP agents summarize recent project blockers from ticketing systems (e.g., Jira) to provide the manager with context on operational hurdles.

segments.name: Retrospective & Accountability
prompts: What is a recent win we can celebrate?
What is a recent challenge you faced, and what did we learn from how it was handled?
segments.aiSupport: Maintaining a secure, encrypted log of coaching conversations within the platform for continuity and follow-through on commitments.

segments.name: Growth, Feedback, & Career
segments.focus: Commitment to the Growth of People
prompts: What new skills are you interested in acquiring?
Do you feel you are receiving enough actionable feedback from me to advance your career?
segments.aiSupport: AI suggests personalized training modules or mentorship connections based on the employee's expressed career aspirations.
